meanings.definition: One who calls incorrectly or wrongly.
meanings.sent1: The miscaller dialed the wrong number and apologized for the mistake.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked the class to raise their hands if they had ever been a miscaller during a phone call.
meanings.sent3: The miscaller accidentally called the pizza place instead of their friend, resulting in a funny conversation.
meanings.sent4: Being a miscaller in the game of telephone can lead to hilarious misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: The miscaller's habit of misdialing numbers made them infamous among their friends.

meanings.definition: To call someone by the wrong name or title.
meanings.sent1: She felt embarrassed when she miscaller her new coworker by the wrong name.
meanings.sent2: He tends to miscaller his dog by his brother's name when he's not paying attention.
meanings.sent3: The comedian intentionally miscaller the audience members for a comedic effect.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the evil stepmother would miscaller Cinderella to assert her dominance.
meanings.sent5: The tired nurse would often miscaller the patients after long night shifts.
